description: Withdraw data processing consent easily with this comprehensive form.
name: Data Processing Consent Withdrawal Form

steps.title: Data Processing Consent Withdrawal Form
steps.text: Please complete the fields below to withdraw your consent for the processing of your personal data. Your request will be processed promptly in accordance with data protection regulations. Thank you for your cooperation.

blocks.label: Requester's Full Name
blocks.help: Enter the full name of the individual requesting consent withdrawal.
blocks.name: name

blocks.label: Requester's Contact Information
blocks.help: Provide contact details such as email address and phone number for communication regarding the withdrawal request.
blocks.name: contact_information

blocks.label: Requester's Address
blocks.help: Provide the postal address of the requester for mailing any confirmation or follow-up.
blocks.name: address

blocks.label: Requester's Identification
blocks.help: Attach a copy of a valid identification document (e.g., passport, driving license) to verify the requester's identity.
blocks.name: identification

blocks.label: Preferred Method of Communication
blocks.help: Specify how the requester prefers to be contacted regarding the erasure request.
blocks.name: delivery_method

blocks.label: Description of Data
blocks.help: Specify the personal data for which the individual wishes to withdraw consent for processing.
blocks.name: description_of_data

blocks.label: Reason for Withdrawal
blocks.help: Provide a brief explanation of why the consent withdrawal is being requested.
blocks.name: reason_for_withdrawal

blocks.label: Additional Comments
blocks.help: Optional: Provide any additional information or context related to the consent withdrawal request.
blocks.name: comments

blocks.label: Signature
blocks.help: Sign to confirm the authenticity of the request and agree to the withdrawal of consent.
blocks.name: signature
